name: Marker Man Adventures
description:
It was just an ordinary day in the life of Markerman, the loveable stick figure, and his pal Scruffy the stick-puppy. That all ended abruptly, however, when Scruffy went missing without a trace. Guide Markerman through hundreds of physics based puzzles using your stylus as a creative tool to safely bring Scruffy the stick-puppy home!

Features

• Use the Touch Screen and stylus to draw your way through 150 challenging physics-based puzzles to get Markerman from point A to point B in a scrolling world
• Draw simple geometric shapes including lines, boxes, circles, triangles and pivot points to create machines that help you progress from level to level
• Collect power-ups to help you solve difficult puzzles
• Use logic to make your way through themed levels including: Underwater, Outer Space, Snow/Ice, and more
• Sandbox play allows you to manipulate the unique physics of Marker Man in an open area.
• Discover dozens of hidden areas and levels, each with unique surprises!
• Challenge your skills in three escalating difficulty modes.
